payload.text: You can view the interest rate for your cash account in the 'Investments' section on the navigation menu. The interest rate is listed under 'Rate pa'.
To better help you with your query could you log in into your account and please ask me again?
For information regarding interest rates on Challenger Annuities, please contact Challenger on 13 25 66.
You can view the interest rate for your client's cash account in the 'Portfolio views' section of the navigation menu. The interest rate is listed under 'Rate pa'.
